Detailed Description

A UDP server that replies with the global status of the octarm.

See octarm_status_t for available status signals. Shutdown priority of object of this class is 0 (will be among the last to shutdown).

int OA6StatusBroadcast::readGlobalConfiguration (   )  [protected]
 

This function will search in the "OA6StatusBroadcast" section of the global configuration (See Octor::setGlobalConfigurationFile() ) for the following additional constants.

  • port - UDP server port. (default = 8001)
  • priority - priority (default = 20)
Returns:
0 on success, -1 on error.
